page.title: 01FAMILY LIFE
page.content: There are four people in my family,I have got a sister called Caroline who is 12 years old.I am 10.My house is part of a new estate of houses at the start of Mead Vale.It has 6 rooms,2 downstairs and 4 up.Our bathroom has a bath,sink and toilet.My bedroom is the smallest. It is also the coldest.I sleep at the front with Mum and Dad. My sister sleeps at the back next to the bathroom .The food we have usually is sausages,chips,potatoes ,carrots and cauliflowers.I have no pets but I've always wanted a dog.My sister wants a cat.On Saturdays we usually go to town.Sometimes me and my Dad go out to play cricket on a nearby recreation ground.My sister and me sometimes fight in the house.
